Service Details: - Offers a complete range of library services, public access computers, online resources, and children's programs- Provides an economical, sustainable, and relevant source for information and entertainment in the BC Southern Interior- Governed by a Board of 25 elected officials representing municipalities, regional districts, and First Nations Please note:  The Administration Office is the central processing headquarters, not a public library location.
